about_the_game:
A racing game... where you don't actually drive??

TurboSquad is a wacky action-packed game that you can play solo, online, or locally with friends.

In these explosive races, players take on the role of a saboteur paired with a not-so-bright AI-controlled car.

The goal? Make sure your driver wins at all costs!

Set traps, dynamite ambushes, or surprise red lights — anything goes, the sneakier the better!

Play solo or jump into multiplayer mayhem with up to four players! Team up with friends to help the same driver in Team Deathmatch, or go all out in Free For All mode where it’s every one for themselves.

Play by your own rules

The night before each race, rig the track with traps to surprise your opponents and give your driver the edge.

During the race, trigger your traps, protect your driver, and sabotage your rivals’ plans!

Join the Turbo Squad

Anyone can pick it up, but only the cleverest will thrive!

Timing your boosts, orchestrating the perfect ambush, and crossing the finish line first will require wit and skill.

Will you target the drivers or the saboteurs? Disarm enemy traps or lay down even trickier ones?

With endless strategies, the choice is yours!

A Ridiculously Ruthless Universe

Race through colorful circuits packed with chaos and surprises!

From the lush fields of Mount Boom to the scorching Salty Mines desert and the treacherous Ambush Canyon, unexpected twists lurk around every turn.

Beware—your next big surprise could be right around the corner!

Features

  • Wacky Duos: Meet zany characters like Poulette and her egg, Ninja & Panda, or the unforgettable Monsieur and Madame Potato!

  • Rich Gameplay: Arm yourself with crazy weapons and discover overpowered traps like boxing gloves, homing missile turrets, and wolf traps.

  • Varied Tracks: Race on circuits packed with loops, ramps, and countless surprises to keep the chaos coming.

  • Epic Car Surfing: Hitch a ride, surf behind cars, and look ridiculously cool while doing it!

  • Flexible Play Modes: Go solo against bots, compete online in multiplayer, or team up in local co-op for maximum fun.

Follow the development

This game is still in active development. If you want to follow the adventure, join out discord server!

  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Graphics 4400 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
